column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////My first visit was on the 4th of July after my *brilliant* idea to trek all the way out to Naperville for Rib Fest.  After being denied entry due to massive crowds
column2: missing REO Speedwagon and fireworks and getting completely lost in the 'burbs
column4: STARVING and seriously in need of a beverage.  Cafe Ba Ba Reeba met our only criteria:
